name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in AI solutions and distributed systems, leveraging my strong background in **Python** to deliver high-performance applications. My technical proficiency includes working with **Go**, **C**, and **C++**, alongside modern development practices in container runtimes and microVMs. I have hands-on experience implementing sandboxing techniques to enhance the security of applications. 

My comprehensive expertise extends to full-stack development utilizing frameworks and libraries such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by a robust cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led enterprise-grade platform development that integrates AI/ML capabilities, focusing on predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. With a solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, I ensure the creation of secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My experience includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
